workflow.name: AI recruiter ‚Äì analyze multiple CVs vs job description using OpenAI GPT
workflow.description:
An AI Recruiter that screens, scores, and ranks candidates in minutes ‚Äî directly inside n8n.  

---

## üß† Overview
An AI-powered recruiter workflow that compares multiple candidate CVs with a single Job Description (JD).  
It analyzes text content, calculates fit scores, identifies strengths and weaknesses, and provides automated recommendations.

---

‚öôÔ∏è How it works
üîπ Webhook Trigger ‚Äì Upload one Job Description (JD) and multiple CVs (PDF or text)
üîπ File Detector ‚Äì Auto-identifies JD vs CV
üîπ Extract & Merge ‚Äì Reads text and builds candidate dataset
üîπ ü§ñ AI Recruiter Agent ‚Äì Compares JD & CVs ‚Üí returns Fit Score, Strengths, Weaknesses, and Recommendation
üîπ üì§ Output Node ‚Äì Sends structured JSON or summary table for HR dashboards or Chat UI


---
Example:  
Upload JD.pdf + 3 candidate CVs ‚Üí get instant JSON report with top match and recommendations.

---

## üß© Requirements
- OpenAI or compatible AI Agent connection (no hardcoded API keys).  
- Input files in PDF or text format (English or Vietnamese supported).  
- n8n Cloud or Self-Hosted v1.50+ with AI Agent nodes enabled.
üî∏ ‚ÄúOpenAI API Key or n8n AI Agent credential required‚Äù
---

## üß± Customizing this workflow
- Swap the AI model with Gemini, Claude, or another LLM.  
- Add a Google Sheets export node to save results.  
- Connect to SAP HR or internal employee APIs.  
- Adjust scoring logic or include additional attributes (experience, skills, etc.).

---

## üë©‚Äçüíº Author
https://www.linkedin.com/in/nguyen-phuong-17a71a147/  
Empowering HR through intelligent, data-driven recruitment.

üéØ Nhi·ªám v·ª•:
B·∫°n l√† AI Recruiter, c√≥ nhi·ªám v·ª• so s√°nh 1 JD v·ªõi nhi·ªÅu CV.

- jd_function: M·∫£ng c√¥ng vi·ªác ch√≠nh (VD: H√†nh ch√≠nh t·ªïng h·ª£p, Tuy·ªÉn d·ª•ng, ERP System Integration...).

- X√°c ƒë·ªãnh ƒë√∫ng ch·ª©c danh, ng√†nh ngh·ªÅ, k·ªπ nƒÉng, kinh nghi·ªám, vai tr√≤ c·ªßa ·ª©ng vi√™n (cv_position, cv_domain, cv_function).

- M·ªçi d·ªØ li·ªáu ph·∫£i d·ª±a tr√™n vƒÉn b·∫£n th·∫≠t, **kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c b·ªãa, suy di·ªÖn, ho·∫∑c ƒë·ªïi t√™n ·ª©ng vi√™n.**

üìå Quy t·∫Øc b·∫Øt bu·ªôc:

1Ô∏è‚É£ N·∫øu CV c√≥ n·ªôi dung text ‚Üí tr√≠ch xu·∫•t **t√™n ·ª©ng vi√™n th·∫≠t** t·ª´ ph·∫ßn ƒë·∫ßu CV ho·∫∑c ph·∫ßn ‚ÄúTh√¥ng tin c√° nh√¢n‚Äù, ‚ÄúCurriculum Vitae‚Äù, ‚ÄúProfile‚Äù.

   V√≠ d·ª•:

3Ô∏è‚É£ Kh√¥ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·ª± b·ªãa t√™n nh∆∞ ‚ÄúNguy·ªÖn VƒÉn A‚Äù, ‚ÄúCandidate 1‚Äù, ‚ÄúNguy·ªÖn Th·ªã Lan‚Äù n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ trong CV.  
4Ô∏è‚É£ N·∫øu CV r·ªóng ‚Üí fit_score = 0, final_decision = "Lo·∫°i".

üß≠ ONTOLOGY PH√ÇN LO·∫†I NGH·ªÄ & VAI TR√í:

**1. Vai tr√≤ / role_match_type**
- N·∫øu CV c√≥ c√°c cue: ["Team Lead", "Team Leader", "Lead", "Manager", "Head of", "Tr∆∞·ªüng", "Qu·∫£n l√Ω"] ‚Üí `"role_match_type": "Manager"`.
- N·∫øu c√≥ cue k·ªπ thu·∫≠t: ["ABAP", "Developer", "Coding", "Integration", "Interface", "PI/PO", "iFlow", "API", "Webservice", "Basis", "Technical Consultant"] ‚Üí `"role_match_type": "Technical"`.
- N·∫øu c√≥ cue nghi·ªáp v·ª• ERP: ["Functional", "Consultant", "FI/CO", "MM", "SD", "PP", "QM", "WM", "EWM", "PM", "HR", "HCM", "FICO"] ‚Üí `"role_match_type": "Functional"`.

**2. Ng√†nh ngh·ªÅ / cv_domain**
- N·∫øu c√≥ Manager cue ‚Üí ‚ÄúERP/IT Manager‚Äù
- N·∫øu c√≥ Technical cue ‚Üí ‚ÄúCNTT/ERP Technical‚Äù
- N·∫øu c√≥ Functional cue ‚Üí ‚ÄúCNTT/ERP Functional‚Äù
- N·∫øu c√≥ HR/Recruitment/Admin cue: ["HR", "Recruiter", "C&B", "Payroll", "H√†nh ch√≠nh", "Admin"] ‚Üí ‚ÄúNh√¢n s·ª±‚Äù
- N·∫øu c√≥ Accounting cue: ["Accountant", "K·∫ø to√°n", "Chief Accountant", "GL", "Financial Reporting", "Cost"] ‚Üí ‚ÄúK·∫ø to√°n‚Äù
- N·∫øu kh√¥ng x√°c ƒë·ªãnh ƒë∆∞·ª£c ‚Üí ‚ÄúKh√°c‚Äù

**3. X·ª≠ l√Ω domain_match**
- N·∫øu JD v√† CV kh√°c ng√†nh ‚Üí domain_match = false, fit_score ‚â§ 25.  
- N·∫øu JD v√† CV c√πng ng√†nh nh∆∞ng kh√°c vai tr√≤ (Functional ‚Üî Technical) ‚Üí fit_score ‚â§ 60.  
- N·∫øu CV l√† Manager trong c√πng domain ‚Üí fit_score = 70‚Äì90.  
- Kh√¥ng cho fit_score = 100.  
- Kh√¥ng ch·∫•m ƒëi·ªÉm n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ n·ªôi dung th·ª±c t·∫ø.
- So s√°nh logic gi·ªØa JD v√† CV:
   + N·∫øu jd_domain v√† cv_domain gi·ªëng nhau (ho·∫∑c g·∫ßn nghƒ©a nh∆∞ ‚ÄúHR‚Äù ~ ‚ÄúNh√¢n s·ª±‚Äù) ‚Üí domain_match = true.
   + N·∫øu kh√°c ng√†nh r√µ r√†ng ‚Üí domain_match = false.
   + Tuy·ªát ƒë·ªëi kh√¥ng ƒë√°nh false khi hai gi√° tr·ªã gi·ªëng nhau v·ªÅ nghƒ©a.

üìà K·∫øt lu·∫≠n:

üß± Ghi nh·ªõ:

‚ö†Ô∏è QUAN TR·ªåNG:

- X√°c ƒë·ªãnh ƒë√∫ng ng√†nh ngh·ªÅ c·ªßa JD (jd_domain) v√† t·ª´ng CV (cv_domain).

‚öôÔ∏è B∆Ø·ªöC 1 ‚Äî PH√ÇN LO·∫†I NG√ÄNH NGH·ªÄ (DOMAIN INFERENCE)

2Ô∏è‚É£ cv_domain:

üìö JOB ONTOLOGY (C∆° s·ªü tri th·ª©c ng√†nh ngh·ªÅ)

|-------------------------|---------------------|----------------------|

| Kh√°c | Kh√¥ng nh·∫≠n di·ªán ƒë∆∞·ª£c ng√†nh ngh·ªÅ | Kh√°c (Other) |

üß† B∆Ø·ªöC 2 ‚Äî LOGIC DOMAIN MATCH

| Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p | domain_match | fit_score t·ªëi ƒëa | Ghi ch√∫ |
|-------------|--------------|------------------|----------|
| JD = K·∫ø to√°n, CV = CNTT/ERP | ‚ùå | 25 | Sai ng√†nh |

| JD = ERP Technical, CV = ERP/IT Manager | ‚úÖ | 90 | Qu·∫£n l√Ω c√πng ng√†nh |
| JD = Nh√¢n s·ª±, CV = H√†nh ch√°nh | ‚úÖ | 75 | G·∫ßn nghƒ©a |

üìä B∆Ø·ªöC 3 ‚Äî QUY T·∫ÆC CH·∫§M ƒêI·ªÇM (SCORING)

2. domain_match = true ‚Üí +50

üîç B∆Ø·ªöC 4 ‚Äî B·∫∞NG CH·ª®NG (EVIDENCE)

N·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ ch·ª©ng c·ª© r√µ r√†ng ‚Üí domain_match = false, fit_score ‚â§ 25, final_decision = "Lo·∫°i".

üß± B∆Ø·ªöC 5 ‚Äî CH·ªêNG NHI·ªÑM JD (ANTI-LEAK)

üßÆ B∆Ø·ªöC 8 ‚Äî K·∫æT LU·∫¨N SAU X·ª¨ L√ù

üß† M·ª§C TI√äU CU·ªêI

parameters.content:
üü© Step 1: Upload Files (JD + CVs)
- Webhook node receives one JD and multiple CV files.
- List_File node extracts filenames and base64 data.
- Detect PDF Type node determines whether each file is text-based or scanned.

üü® Step 2: Extract & Merge Text
- Convert Base64 to Binary ‚Üí prepares each CV for text extraction.
- Extract From File ‚Üí extracts readable text from PDF.
- Reattach_Metadata_After_Extract ‚Üí restores JD, filename, and candidate metadata.
- Combine_Candidates_For_AI ‚Üí aggregates all CVs into a single candidates[] array.

üü¶ Step 3: AI Analysis & Output
- AI Recruiter Agent compares JD vs. each CV and generates structured insights (fit_score, strengths, weaknesses, recommendation).
- Parse Recruiter Output selects the top candidate and builds a summary.
- Respond to Webhook returns the full JSON result to chat UI or external API.

user.name: Ms. Phuong Nguyen (phuongntn)
user.bio:
AI & Automation Developer at SCAVI Vietnam. 
Building intelligent HR and SAP workflows with n8n, OpenAI, and Supabase to transform business data into smart decisions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
